name: Rabbit (ugurchan)
description:
Puzzle platformer where in order to jump, first you have to fall. The Rabbit can only jump as much as the height it dropped from, carrots and jumping on snails boosts it a bit. Collect carrots to open the gate, collect keys to pass locked walls. And dont look them in the eye. They are always watching. Always smiling…

Every code, music, sound, graphic asset made by Ugurchan.

Controls: Left Arrow Key, Right Arrow Key, R (restart).
